targets.query: SELECT count(distinct(application_name)) FROM (SELECT * FROM "spring_integration_send" WHERE  ("stream_name" =~ /^$stream_name$/ )  group by application_name)

SELECT "count"  / 60 FROM "spring_integration_send" WHERE ("stream_name" =~ /^$stream_name$/ AND "type" = 'channel' AND "application_name" =~ /^$application_name$/ AND "application_guid" =~ /^$application_guid$/ AND "result" = 'success' AND ( "name" = 'output' OR "name" = 'input')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "application_name", "name", "application_guid"

SELECT "count"  / 60 FROM "spring_integration_send" WHERE ("stream_name" =~ /^$stream_name$/ AND "type" = 'channel' AND "application_name" =~ /^$application_name$/ AND "application_guid" =~ /^$application_guid$/ AND "result" = 'success' AND ( "name" = 'output' OR "name" = 'input')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "application_name", "name", "application_guid"

SELECT "mean" FROM "spring_integration_send" WHERE ("stream_name" =~ /^$stream_name$/ AND "application_name" =~ /^$application_name$/ AND "type" = 'channel' AND "application_guid" =~ /^$application_guid$/ AND "result" = 'success' AND ( "name" = 'output' OR "name" = 'input')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "stream_name", "application_name", "application_guid", "result", "name"

SELECT "mean" FROM "spring_integration_send" WHERE ("stream_name" =~ /^$stream_name$/ AND "application_name" =~ /^$application_name$/ AND "type" = 'channel' AND "application_guid" =~ /^$application_guid$/ AND "result" = 'success' AND ( "name" = 'output' OR "name" = 'input')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "stream_name", "application_name", "application_guid", "result", "name"

list.definition: select distinct("stream_name") from (select  * from "spring_integration_send" WHERE time > now() - 60s)
list.label: stream
list.name: stream_name
list.query: select distinct("stream_name") from (select  * from "spring_integration_send" WHERE time > now() - 60s)

list.definition: show tag values with key="application_name" WHERE stream_name='$stream_name'
list.label: application
list.name: application_name
list.query: show tag values with key="application_name" WHERE stream_name='$stream_name'

list.definition: show tag values with key="name" WHERE stream_name='$stream_name' AND application_name='$application_name'
list.label: name
list.name: name
list.query: show tag values with key="name" WHERE stream_name='$stream_name' AND application_name='$application_name'

list.definition: show tag values from "spring_integration_send" with key = "application_guid" WHERE stream_name = '$stream_name'
list.label: guid
list.name: application_guid
list.query: show tag values from "spring_integration_send" with key = "application_guid" WHERE stream_name = '$stream_name'
